product_name: REI  Polar Pod Lite Sleeping Bag - Long - Special Buy
long_description: A great value for campers and backpackers, the synthetic REI Polar Pod Lite Sleeping Bag is priced for your budget, yet it's still feature-packed and built to keep you warm on 3-season adventures.
